bill.summary: 12/22/1987--Introduced. Hunter Protection Act of 1988 - Establishes civil penalties for knowingly interfering with the conduct of a lawful hunt on lands affected with a Federal interest. Authorizes injunctive relief, the recovery of actual and punitive damages, and attorneys' fees. Grants hunting and sportsman's organizations standing under this Act.
